description.value: A Rally plugin to associate tickets to Rally artifacts
description.title: App Description

helpText.value: The API Key is a persistent, generated authentication key used to query and update Rally objects. Refer to Rally documentation on generating an API key.
helpText.title: Text field below apikey explaining the field's use.

label.title: The Zendesk Custom Field ID used in the application

helpText.value: The plugin requires custom text field to store a reference to the associated Rally defect. Have your Zendesk admin create one and provide you with this ID
helpText.title: Text field below customfieldid explaining the field's use.

label_search_term.title: Label for search term text field

no_results.title: Description for No results found notification

cannot_associate.value: You cannot associate tasks to a ticket.
cannot_associate.title: Description for cannot associate notification
